item.title: Determine your technical debt using SonarQube - Bonus SonarLint extension configuration
item.author: vbiret+blog@outlook.com (Vincent Biret)
item.description: TL; DR You can display SonarQube static analysis results live in Visual Studio error and information console using the same rules set as the SonarQube project. Installing the extension Just go to https://www.sonarlint.org/VisualStudio/index.html and proceed with the installation. Binding the Visual Studio solution to the SonarQube analysis From the Team Explorer click SonarQube Click on connect. (if you obtain a certificate error, you must install the self-signed certificate of the SonarQube server on your machine)
